member.name: WinRT.RoFreeParameterizedTypeExtra
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: WinRT.RoGetParameterizedTypeInstanceIID
member.summary: Computes the interface identifier (IID) of the interface or delegate type that results when a parameterized interface or delegate is instantiated with the specified type arguments.
member.param: A parsed Windows Runtime type name, as returned by the function. For example, "Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVector`1", and "N1.N2.IFoo".

param.name: metaDataLocator
param.para: A callback to use for resolving metadata.

An implementation should use the function to discover the necessary metadata (.winmd) file and examine the metadata to determine the necessary type information. Because the RoGetMetaDataFile function does not cache results, locators should cache the results as appropriate for the programming model being implemented.

member.param: The IID of the interface or delegate that corresponds with nameElements.
Handle to the IID that corresponds with nameElements.

listheader.description: Insufficient memory available to complete the task.
The wrong number of type arguments are provided for a parameterized type.

returns.para: A failure may also occur if a type is inappropriate for the context in which it appears.

member.name: WinRT.RoParameterizedTypeExtraGetTypeSignature
member.summary: Gets the type signature used to compute the IID from the last call to with the specified handle.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
